musicgen-small.description: Lightweight 300M model for fast and efficient text-to-music generation by Meta

musicgen-large.description: High-capacity 3.3B model for expressive and high-fidelity music generation by Meta

sao.description: Latent diffusion model for high-quality text-to-audio generation by Stability AI

songgen.description: Interactive AI songwriting assistant for co-creative and personalized music generation

acestep.description: Open-source foundation model for controllable music generation, featuring a versatile architecture for diverse music AI tasks
